wn_desk.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**************************************************************************
00002 $Header: WN_DESK.C Fri 10-27-2000 8:33:57 pm HvA V2.01 $
00003 
00004 DESC:  Desktop utilities for HVA_WIN
00005 HIST:  20001027 V2.01 - Adapting for DJGPP
00006 ***************************************************************************/
00007 
00008 #include "video/v_video.h"
00009 #include "window.h"
00010 #include "fortify.h"
00011 
00012 extern SCREEN _cursvar;
00013 
00014 /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00015     FUNCTION: wn_desktop()
00016      PURPOSE: Save or restore current screen as the desktop
00017       SYNTAX: int wn_desktop(int mode);
00018  DESCRIPTION: int mode : 0 = Save current screen as desktop
00019                          1 = Restore saved desktop (if any)
00020      RETURNS: TRUE if succesfull restorage, FALSE if not one saved
00021      HISTORY: 20-Oct-1993 V0.1
00022 --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00023 int wn_desktop(int mode)
00024 {
00025   static char *desktop = NULL;
00026 
00027   switch(mode) {
00028     case 0:               /* Save desktop                        */
00029       if (!desktop) {     /* Allocate memory if not already done */
00030         desktop = (unsigned char *) malloc(_cursvar.cols*_cursvar.lines*2);
00031         if (desktop == NULL) {
00032           fprintf(stderr,"ERROR: out of memory for saving desktop");
00033           exit(0);
00034         }
00035       }
00036       v_gettext(0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,desktop);
00037       return(FALSE);
00038       break;
00039 
00040     case 1:                 /* Restore desktop if already saved */
00041       if (desktop) {
00042         v_puttext(0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,desktop);
00043         return(TRUE);
00044       }
00045       return(FALSE);
00046       break;
00047   }
00048 
00049   return(FALSE);
00050 }
